await dataVerification.connect(user2).verifyData(0, 1, "Test");
console.log(await dataVerification.accessControl());
console.log(await accessControl.isVerifier(user2.address));
await accessControl.grantVerifierRole(user2.address);
user2 = await hre.ethers.getSigner("0x3C44CdDdB6a900fa2b585dd299e03d12FA4293BC");
dataVerification = await hre.ethers.getContractAt("DataVerification", "0x9fE46736679d2D9a65F0992F2272dE9f3c7fa6e0");
const accessControl = await hre.ethers.getContractAt("IoTDataAccessControl", "0xe7f1725E7734CE288F8367e1Bb143E90bb3F0512");
accessControl = await ethers.getContractAt("IoTDataAccessControl", "0xe7f1725E7734CE288F8367e1Bb143E90bb3F0512");
ethers = require("ethers");
